95, 438, 781, 

perioda je 50455 * 343 = 17306065
inkrement vysky je 26398054

1000000000000 / perioda = 57783 zv 3646105

v = 57783 * 26398054 + f(3646105)[5561639] = 1525364315920 WA
1525364315921 WA too low
1525364315922 WA too low

---


p = 50455

7 p je perioda = 50455 * 7 = 353185

1000000000000 / p = 19819641 zv 13345
1000000000000 / perioda = 2831377 zv 114255

prirastok za 1 periodu je: 300+ 306+ 303+ 303+ 301+ 306+ 301 = 2120

vysledok = 2126 + 2831376 * 2120 + (od 1 periody po 114255 kamenov)

---

double period

per = 34612130
inc = 52796108

1x / per = 28891 zv 20952170

res = 52796108 * 28891 + f(20952170)[31959693] = 1525364315921

---
ex

p = 40 * 5 = 200
7p = perioda = 1400
inkrement 2120

1000000000000 / perioda = 714285714 zv 400
v = 2126 + 714285713 * 2120 + f(400)[602]
